mapper.select:
select
from completedorder
and order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
and wm_poi_name like concat('%',#{wmPoiName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select status,count(status) as count from completedorder where (app_poi_code=#{appPoiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or app_poi_code=#{appEleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND date >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND date <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY status

SELECT
FROM completedorder as a INNER JOIN ( select app_poi_code as poiCode,order_id from completedorder where (app_poi_code=#{appPoiCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or app_poi_code=#{appEleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND date >= #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND date <= #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}) as b on a.app_poi_code=b.poiCode and a.order_id=b.order_id

order_tag_list = #{orderTagList,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wm_order_id_view = #{wmOrderIdView,jdbcType=BIGINT},

shipping_fee = #{shippingFee,jdbcType=REAL},

caution = #{caution,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

is_pre_sale_order = #{isPreSaleOrder,jdbcType=CHAR},
dinners_number = #{dinnersNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},

incmp_modules = #{incmpModules,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_phone_number = #{orderPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
